item.title: Go: Books for learning Golang
item.description: Golang Books I have only recently started learning Go; and have fallen in love with the language since. I wanted to write a quick post highlighting the main resources I have been using on my journey so far. Get Programming with Go The first book I bought on the subject was Get Programming with Go by Nathan Youngman. I found this book an excellent introduction to all of the main topics you’re likely to encounter in Go as a beginner.

item.title: Go: Writing unit tests in Go
